name: Infinite Craft Game Save
summary: Learn about .IC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Infinite Craft is a free, browser-based crafting and exploration game. In the game, players start with four basic elements—water, fire, earth, and wind—and combine them to create new items. It's popular among casual gamers, streamers, and those who enjoy creative or sandbox-style games.

The game offers multiple save slots to preserve a player's progress, accessible through the game menu. To download a saved game as an IC file, select Menu, and then click Download under the saved game.

description: An IC file is a game save created by Infinite Craft, a browser-based crafting game developed by Neal Agarwal. It stores a player's progress, including discovered items, combinations, and the current state of the crafting board. IC files allow players to back up or share their game data.

instructions: You can open IC files with Infinite Craft by uploading them via a web browser. To open an IC file, select Menu, and then click Upload in the save slot in which you want to open the IC file.
Infinibrowser Save File Analyzer also allows you to open IC files. It is an online tool that runs in a web browser.
